snippet: New Delhi Television accused an Indian joint venture of Nielsen with manipulating data on ratings for nearly a decade, costing it billions of dollars.
abstract: New Delhi Television sues the Nielsen Company, accusing its Indian unit of providing 'false, fabricated, and manipulative data' on television ratings for almost a decade; claims the manipulated data cost the leading Indian network nearly a billion dollars in advertising revenue and is seeking several billion dollars in damages.
lead_paragraph: New Delhi Television accused an Indian joint venture of Nielsen with manipulating data on ratings for nearly a decade, costing it billions of dollars.

headline.seo: Indian TV Network Sues Nielsen Over Ratings
headline.main: Indian TV Network Sues Nielsen Over Ratings Data
headline.print_headline: Indian TV Network Sues Nielsen Over Ratings Data
